column4: how would i go abouts copying an icon set to /usr/share/icons with permissions?
im not even sure what you are trying to do.
just copying these icons that i downloaded to the usr/share/icons directory. i cant extract it there because it says i dont have the proper permissions. i also cant copy paste it there either
why are you putting them in there?  icon themnes can go in the users home in the .icons directory I think

'sudo cp  fileyouwant /path/to/put/it/to'   is the core of it.. I wouldent be messing with your icons/system dirs untill you understand some more linux basics.. One typo with sudo and you can break things badly
